Today, everything is about technology and quick access—from small items to major needs, we humans increasingly rely on technology. An app like this could be a great help, especially for users living in the countryside or remote villages where access to NHS services or doctors may be limited.

This app can bridge that gap by providing quick access to certified First Aiders, helping address immediate first aid needs efficiently.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Sometimes, medical emergencies may not be severe enough to require a visit to a GP, MHS, or a nearby doctor, but still need immediate attention—like when kids are playing and need quick first aid treatment.**
**In such cases, instead of going to a GP or doctor, having access to a certified First Aider—easily searchable through an app—could help resolve the issue more efficiently.
